meanings.definition: A person who enjoys outdoor activities such as hunting, fishing, and camping.
meanings.sent1: The outdoorsman went fishing by the lake.
meanings.sent2: My uncle is a true outdoorsman who loves camping in the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The outdoorsman tried to catch a fish with his bare hands, but ended up scaring them away.
meanings.sent4: His love for nature turned him into a real outdoorsman, always seeking adventure.
meanings.sent5: The outdoorsman's backpack was filled with all the gear needed for a weekend in the woods.

meanings.definition: A man who is skilled in outdoor pursuits and activities.
meanings.sent1: The experienced outdoorsman knew how to start a campfire in no time.
meanings.sent2: He was known as the best outdoorsman in the group due to his survival skills.
meanings.sent3: The outdoorsman showed off his skills by building a shelter out of branches and leaves.
meanings.sent4: His determination in the wild made him a true outdoorsman, respected by all.
meanings.sent5: The outdoorsman's knowledge of the forest was unmatched, guiding lost hikers back to safety.
